heading.title: Frequently Asked Questions
heading.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

questions.question: Do you provide food?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide food. To receive this service, you must include the food option in your reservation.

questions.question: Do you offer parking surveillance?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide surveillance for vehicles. Our parking lot is equipped with security cameras that monitor the perimeter of the hotel.

questions.question: Does the hotel have a pool?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we don't have a pool yet. We are working on it and hope to have one soon.

questions.question: What are the main attractions near the hotel?
questions.answer: Our hotel is located in the heart of the city, near the beach, main shopping centers, tourist attractions, and the best restaurants and bars.

questions.question: What are the prices?
questions.answer: Prices vary depending on the type of room. We offer single, double, triple rooms, and suites. Rates range from $50 to $200 per night, with special prices for extended stays.

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in is available 24 hours a day, and check-out is at 11:00 AM on the last day of your stay.

questions.question: Do you allow pets?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we do not allow pets.

questions.question: Is parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, we have parking available for our guests.

questions.question: Do you accept credit cards?
questions.answer: Yes, we accept credit cards and online payments.

questions.question: Do you provide payment receipts?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request a payment receipt at the reception.

header.title: Select your ideal room!
header.complementaryText: Discover the perfect space tailored to your needs, whether you're here to relax, work, or enjoy an unforgettable stay.
